data.description:
Greeting & Salutations Human!

Behold, the BorkMR Timer a MIXED REALITY Timer – a marvel of modern technology with more tricks up its digital sleeve than you'd expect:
(lol it's a basic timer but in the "metaverse")

• Easily set your desired time limit – because let's face it, time doesn't wait for anyone.
• Engage the "start" button and witness the passage of time as it slips through your grasp.
• Need to catch your breath? No worries! Pause the timer and take a breather.
• Reset and restart whenever your plans go slightly off the rails.
• And for the grand finale, an alarm sound that will pique your attention like a master conductor. Missed deadlines? Not here!

This demo uses Hand Tracking

• Use the purple bar on the bottom to Grab and Move the Timer panel
• Use your hands to interact with the buttons on the Timer
• Use the Left Hand Menu to add more Timer panels

Any Feedback?
Let Me Know What You Think!

feedback@bork.tech

- Changed Alarm Sound
